title: doc: document additional XCode installation steps
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

http://golang.org/doc/install/source#ctools should be updated to indicate that
additional steps are required to get a working compiled on OSX 10.7+ / XCode 4.3.

Please use labels and text to provide additional information.

http://developer.apple.com/library/ios/#documentation/DeveloperTools/Conceptual/WhatsNewXcode/Articles/xcode_4_3.html

https://groups.google.com/d/topic/golang-nuts/HNPyZLvftdA/discussion
